text: Central Bengkulu is a regency of Bengkulu Province, Indonesia. It is located on the island of Sumatra, and was formed by being split away from the neighbouring North Bengkulu Regency. ==Administrative districts== The Regency is divided into ten districts (kecamatan), detailed below with their areas and populations at the 2010 Census:Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! District !! Area ( in km²) !!
